translations: n.正式建议，提议；推荐，介绍；<美>推荐信

sentences.sentence: I got the job on the strength of your recommendation.
sentences.translation: 由于您的推荐，我得到了那份工作。

sentences.sentence: The best way of finding a lawyer is through personal recommendation.
sentences.translation: 找律师的最好方法是通过个人推荐。

sentences.sentence: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentences.translation: 我们近60％的预订来自于回头客生意或个人推荐。
